title: Liam Gallagher's daughter Molly Moorish adds his surname on Instagram
text:
In 2018, they reunited for the first time in 19 years.

And Liam Gallagher's daughter Molly Moorish has taken things one step forward, as she added his surname to her Instagram handle on Friday.

The model, 21, shared a sweet family snap with her father on Friday, where she hugged the singer, 47, as they enjoyed some quality time together.

Happy family: Liam Gallagher's daughter Molly Moorish changed her Instagram handle to include his surname a year after they reconciled... as she shared sweet snap with the rocker

Molly looked stylish in a colourful army jacket, while she wore a a black Gucci hat low over her eyes.

Wrapping her arms lovingly around her dad, Molly couldn't help but smile from ear-to-ear as they posed for a photo.

Meanwhile, Liam opted for a more casual look for the occasion, as he wore a bath robe and a matching Gucci hat while making an obscene gesture with his hands.

The model reunited with her singer father in 2018 for the first time in 19 years

The model reunited with her singer father in 2018 for the first time in 19 years - but according to The Sun the reunion is said to have caused ructions between Molly, Liam's brother Noel, his wife Sara MacDonald and his daughter Anais Gallagher, 19.

During Molly and Liam's estrangement, Noel, 52 and Molly shared a close bond, with the then-teen and and Wonderwall writer pictured together on social media in June 2017 in a post captioned #FAMILYFIRST.'

The couple are also said to have helped Molly through her education, taken her on holidays and supported her, but Molly is now said to have 'turned her back' on Noel and his family.

Claim: It was previously reported that Molly is at the centre of a new feud with her uncle Noel amid claims she cut off contact after reuniting with her dad

A source said: 'Liam didn't give a s**t for years, now suddenly she's part of the gang and Noel is a distant memory.

'Molly is family to him and Sara, and they treated her as such. Since she went over to the dark side it's all stopped.'

It was also claimed that Noel's circle believe Molly is using Liam's popularity to boost her modelling career.

Liam fathered Molly in 1998 with former flame Lisa Moorish, while his other daughter Gemma, seven, was born after a fling with journalist Liza Ghorbani, ending his marriage at the time to Nicole Appleton.

Bond: During Molly and Liam's estrangement, Noel, 52 and Sara shared a close bond, with the then-teen and and Wonderwall writer pictured together on social media in June 2017 in a post captioned #FAMILYFIRST'

Speaking about his relationship with Molly in the past, Liam said: 'I've just never got around to meeting her. I've heard she's all right, though. She's doing all right.

'I never heard anything that she wanted to meet me.'

Talking about Gemma, Liam added: 'Not met the one in New York either. But I wish them well. if they ever need anything, give us a shout.'

Siblings: Molly is pictured with brothers Lennon, 19, and Gene, 18, who insulted Noel's daughter Anais, 19, in 2017, likening her to Noel 'in a blonde wig'

Liam and Noel's long-standing dispute dates back to their days in the band, before Noel quit insisting that he couldn't work with his brother 'a day longer'.

The siblings enjoyed a hugely successful career from 1991 to 2009, coining the Britpop era during their chart feud with Blur.

During the pinnacle of their fame, all seven of their albums hit the No1 spot in the UK charts and the boys were awarded with the Outstanding Contribution to Music Award at the BRIT Awards in 2007.
description: The model, 21, shared a sweet family snap with her father on Friday, where she hugged the singer, 47, as she added his surname to her Instagram handle on Friday.
